section.title: RestoreZoneBulk Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Restore several complete zones (or just set all records for some other reason).

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void RestoreZoneBulk( string[] zonenames, string nameservergroup, string[] zones )

tr.td: the nameserver group that should host the zones
an array of base64 encoded values each containing a zone to restore
